name: Hack IT - Its Me Spy Network
name_original: Hack IT - Its Me Spy Network
description:
Hack IT is the application where you'll become a real hacker. You're part of an exclusive spy network, hacking the latest most sophisticated programming matrix. Its up to you to earn money by hacking in the game.

You have to complete all levels by thinking totally "out of the box". You have one job, break the password. Here, ideas are more important than repeated attempts. If you're thinking, its me, it probably is. That is a hint to help you solve what is frankly the most difficult hacking game.

Please support our hard work by subscribing to the game. The subscription period will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period. To turn this function off, simply go to your iTunes account and turn off auto-renew. Renewal payments will differ depending on subscription and pricing at the time of renewal. Your iTunes account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed.

https://dumpsterfireapps.com/privacy.html
https://dumpsterfireapps.com/tos.html
